title: Pink Blue Love Match
description: A fun and engaging love matching puzzle game! Match pink and blue characters to test your romance fortune. Challenge yourself with colorful gameplay and see how high you can score in this adorable matching adventure.
controls: Tap or click to match pink and blue characters. Complete matches to score points and progress through levels. The better your matching skills, the higher your romance fortune index!
author: LightGame Team
features: Cute pink and blue character design
